 5  """ 
 6  Computes a Newton step for a specific function at a specific point 
 7  """ 
 8   
 9  import numpy 
10  import numpy.linalg 
11   

12 -class NewtonStep(object): 

13    """ 
14    The Newton step 
15    """ 

16 -  def __call__(self, function, point, state): 

17      """ 
18      Computes a Newton step based on a function and a point 
19      """ 
20      hessian = function.hessian(point) 
21      gradient = function.gradient(point) 
22      step = (-numpy.linalg.solve(hessian, gradient)).reshape(point.shape) 
23      state['hessian'] = hessian 
24      state['gradient'] = gradient 
25      state['direction'] = step 
26      return step
